attributes.action: Allow BTEC and A Levels to be scrapped in line with Scotland and Wales
attributes.additional_details: Scottish and Welsh individuals applying to universities for September 2021 have an advantage regarding university places due to England being the only area carrying on exams in Yr13 students completing BTECs and A Levels
attributes.background: Scrap exams for all further education students in line with Wales and Scotland so we all get equal opportunities regarding university
